header.title: Software Engineer Co-op | MS CS @ Northeastern | Distributed Systems, Cloud, ML, Full-Stack

resume.summary: MS CS student at Northeastern University with 2.4 years of **Software Engineering** experience at LSEG, specializing in **scalable backend systems**, **cloud architecture (AWS)**, and **event-driven pipelines**. Seeking an 8-month co-op (Jan-Aug 2026) to apply expertise in **Python, Java, Go, Kubernetes, and ML**. Proven ability to deliver high-throughput solutions, optimize performance, and build robust applications. Eager to contribute to innovative projects while completing required degree coursework.

skills.items: Python, Java, Go, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL, C++
Microservices, REST APIs, Event-Driven, Asynchronous Processing, Message Queues
AWS (Lambda, SQS, EC2, S3), Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD, Terraform, Infrastructure-as-Code
MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, SQL Optimization, Database Design
PyTorch, TensorFlow, Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Neural Networks
React, Next.js, Redux, Node.js, Express, HTML, CSS, Server-Side Rendering
Git, Agile, TDD, Design Patterns, SOLID Principles, Code Review, OOP

bullets: Engineered a **high-throughput, event-driven data pipeline** processing 7.5M+ XML compliance records into standardized JSON for 180+ countries.
Optimized batch processing and concurrent execution, **reducing request latency by 40%** and improving high-priority KYC/AML screening turnaround by 35%.
Developed **scalable microservices** using Python/Java (Micronaut) on AWS Lambda, SQS, and API Gateway, ensuring 99.9% data integrity.
Implemented robust security measures (AWS WAF, IAM, TLS), **reducing security incidents by 50%** and ensuring zero-downtime migrations.
Mentored 5 junior engineers and collaborated with 7 cross-functional teams, fostering **technical excellence and collaborative development**.
Engineered **high-throughput Python data processing pipelines**, improving system throughput by 3x through concurrent execution and API orchestration.
Automated critical data extraction and transformation processes, **reducing manual interventions by 50%** and enhancing overall efficiency by 60%.
Optimized database query performance and ETL pipeline efficiency, **reducing data processing latency by 35%** and improving data accuracy by 20%.
Developed comprehensive monitoring, scheduling, and error-handling frameworks, ensuring **robust and reliable microservices integration**.

projects.title: Orion Platform
projects.tech: Go, Kubernetes, Operator SDK, Docker, CRDs
projects.bullet1: Developed a **Kubernetes Operator in Go** for a cloud-native PaaS, enabling single-command deployment of applications with custom CRDs.
projects.bullet2: Implemented **environment-aware provisioning** for services (PostgreSQL, Redis, MinIO) and an event-driven reconciliation loop for lifecycle management.

projects.title: Kambaz Learning Management System
projects.tech: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, Redux Toolkit
projects.bullet1: Built a **full-stack LMS** with Next.js (SSR) and Node.js/Express backend, featuring course management, user authentication, and admin tools.
projects.bullet2: Implemented **Redux Toolkit for state management** and a RESTful API with DAO pattern, achieving comprehensive test coverage and live deployment.

projects.title: Calendly
projects.tech: Java 11, Maven, JUnit, Design Patterns, MVC Architecture
projects.bullet1: Designed an **enterprise-grade calendar application** in Java, applying 6+ design patterns (Command, Factory, Observer) and SOLID principles.
projects.bullet2: Achieved **98% line and 95% mutation test coverage** with JUnit, demonstrating robust, maintainable code and comprehensive TDD practices.
